resources.string: Everything in here are stored on your own drive. Backup your photos on your own network drive. Just connect to your server and relax.
Don\'t know how to setup a network drive?
Me neither. I\'m am app, I can\'t do everything. Just Google it.
YourDrive needs access to photos and videos in order to process.

"Allow YourDrive to store your Drive's credentials encrypted for automatic backup management. Your credentials will be encrypted, kept on a safe environment, and won't be accessible by third parties."
That\'s it! We\'ll handle the rest. You can close the app now
